snippet: Just as the housing market is recovering, a growing group of homeowners — widows over 50 whose husbands held the mortgage — are losing their homes to foreclosure.
abstract: More widows over age 50 whose husbands were sole mortgage holders are losing their homes to foreclosures because of paperwork flaw that keeps them from obtaining loan modifications; trend is contributing to fact that homeowners over 50 are falling into foreclosure at fastest pace of any age group and comes even as housing market is beginning to recover.
lead_paragraph: Just as the housing market is recovering, a growing group of homeowners — widows over 50 whose husbands held the mortgage — are losing their homes to foreclosure.

headline.seo: Widows Pushed Into Foreclosure by Mortgage Fine Print
headline.main: Mortgage Catch Pushes Widows Into Foreclosure
